enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.thunder: 攻击会给目标带来闪电效果。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.freezin: 攻击会减慢目标的移动速度。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.fuse_sh: 弓箭可以射出爆炸箭矢。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.deflect: 箭矢可能会反弹回射手。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.guardin: 击败敌人后会暂时提高防御力。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.leechin: 击败敌人会为使用者恢复生命值。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.rush.de: 使用者受伤后会暂时提高移动速度。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.cowardi: 使用者生命值全满时攻击会造成更多伤害。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.illager: 对亡灵守卫造成更多伤害。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.radianc: 箭矢可以治疗周围的玩家。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.void_st: 连续攻击会造成更多伤害。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.pain_cy: 攻击会伤害使用者。每第五次攻击都会造成巨大伤害。
对背对你的敌人造成额外伤害。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.explodi: 攻击同时会产生爆炸效果。
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.recycle: 被射击时有时会产生箭矢。
enchantment.grapplemod.wallrunenchantmen: 允许使用者在墙壁上奔跑。
enchantment.grapplemod.doublejumpenchant: 允许使用者进行二段跳跃。
enchantment.grapplemod.slidingenchantmen: 允许使用者利用积累的冲刺动量来滑行。
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.life_s: Heals user of the sword % amount of damage dealt.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.flames: Explodes the enemy when arrow hits.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.thunde: Summons lightning on enemy when arrow hits.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.frostb: Stuns enemy for certain seconds on hit.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.galewi: Levitates enemies on hit also gives speed effect based on level of enchantment.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.ethere: Ignores the armor of enemy and deals more damage based on armor value of the enemy.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.berser: Deals extra damage based on your used health.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.echo_b: Deals another damage after certain seconds based on first damage.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.phanto: Gives invisibility effect to user on hit.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.nightm: Summons a Shadow Minion (Lives for certain seconds) to support you when entity killed.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.empowe: Deals extra damage based on hit count (Max hit count = 3, Max hit count increases based on enchantment level).
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.blink_: Teleports user to the enemy on hit, can be used on each 3 hits to the same enemy.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.blade_: Amplify your damage with experience. As your levels grow, so does your damage.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.arrowp: Teleports user to the hit arrow.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.evasio: Cancels the damage dealt with % chance.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.reflec: Deals the % of damage taken to the enemy.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.infern: Turns nearby lava into Hot Ice which can be walked on but Hot Ice turns into lava after certain seconds.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.voraci: Turn experience points to hunger points.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.resili: Gives resistance based on user's used health points.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.berryb: Sweet berry bush damage heals the user.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.phanto: When the user uses the bed, sends him/her to the nightmare universe for a certain period of time.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.fractu: Deals more damage to the armor (Breaks faster).
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.farmer: If user have bone meal in inventory automatically uses it while sneaking.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.aether: If user have Totem of Undying in inventory automatically uses it when user dies also gives more effects than normal based on total enchantments.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.turtle: Gives custom effects to the user while swimming based on enchantment level.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.creepe: When user dies blasts user like a creeper, explode power based on count of armors with this enchant.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.aerial: Teleports items dropped near user to user while elytra flying.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.silk_t: Silk touch but works on every block.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.purifi: Gives smelted version of block broken.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.lumber: Breaks other logs automatically next to the broken log.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.tunnel: Gives haste when stone/ore typed blocks broken.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.nature: Dirt hoed with this enchant become more fertile and produce bone meal randomly.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.blast_: When user right clicks to TNT with the enchant the TNT will explode in 3 seconds with more power based on enchant level.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.flamma: Burns the user with % chance when used.
enchantment.enchantment_evolution.brittl: Breaks the item with % chance based on damage of item.
